subcategories.name: On-road urban / suburban / rural driving
subcategories.what_is_covered: Real or simulated road networks with traffic, road rules, and weather variation.
subcategories.typical_examples: urban roads; highways; intersections; traffic lights/signs; ...

subcategories.name: Off-road, cross-country & planetary terrain
subcategories.what_is_covered: Structured or unstructured natural terrains requiring ground-robot locomotion.

subcategories.name: Basic household tabletop
subcategories.what_is_covered: Small cluttered indoor bench for reach-scale manipulation.
subcategories.typical_examples: cluttered tabletop; household objects; articulated fixtures; ...

subcategories.name: Kitchen & household benchmark suites
subcategories.what_is_covered: Standardised kitchen/tabletop scenes from RLBench, Meta-World, FrankaKitchen, Habitat, Ravens, etc.

subcategories.name: Assembly & insertion tables
subcategories.what_is_covered: Contact-rich assembly surfaces with precisely shaped parts.
subcategories.typical_examples: assembly workspace; peg-hole joints; plug-socket joints; ...

subcategories.name: Shared lab / industrial workcells
subcategories.what_is_covered: Planar or 3-D manipulation bays in labs or factories, often human-robot shared.
subcategories.typical_examples: lab work surfaces; human-robot zones; static & dynamic obstacles; ...

subcategories.name: Multi-room home / office interiors
subcategories.what_is_covered: Photorealistic or simulated domestic & office floorplans for navigation and light manipulation.

subcategories.name: Large-scale mixed indoor-outdoor simulators
subcategories.what_is_covered: Dynamic 3-D worlds with physics for point-goal, exploration, or social-navigation tasks.
subcategories.typical_examples: rooms; mazes; multiple agents; partial observability; ...

subcategories.name: Object-rich mixed-reality scene sets
subcategories.what_is_covered: Real + synthetic household, lab, or industrial spaces emphasising clutter & diversity.
subcategories.typical_examples: household rooms; industrial floors; cluttered indoor scenes; ...

subcategories.name: Classic locomotion & manipulation suites
subcategories.what_is_covered: Widely-used control benchmarks with domain-randomised dynamics.
subcategories.typical_examples: MuJoCo tasks; IsaacGym walkers; Robotarium arena; ...

subcategories.name: High-fidelity multi-physics platforms
subcategories.what_is_covered: Environments that model contact, fluids, deformables & human interaction in indoor/outdoor scenes.
subcategories.typical_examples: rigid-body scenes; deformable objects; fluid interaction; humans; ...
